General.Name: Antler Gold Inc
General.Description: Antler Gold Inc. engages in the exploration and development of mineral properties in Africa. The company holds interests in the Erongo Gold Project covering an area of 70,296.16 Ha located in Karibib district of the Erongo region in central Namibia; and Onkoshi Gold Project covering an area of 19,967.09 Ha located in Karibib district of the Erongo region in central Namibia. It also holds interest in the Crescent Lake molybdenum-lithium-copper-silver project located in Armstrong, Ontario; and Paresis Gold Project located in Namibia; and Kesya rare earth elements project located in southern Zambia. The company was formerly known as Northwest Arm Capital Inc. and changed its name to Antler Gold Inc. in January 2017. Antler Gold Inc. was incorporated in 2016 and is based in Halifax, Canada.
General.Address: Purdy?s Wharf Tower II, Halifax, NS, Canada, B3J 3R7
